build.buildCommand: vite build && esbuild server/index.ts --platform=node --packages=external --bundle --format=esm --outdir=dist --banner:js="import { fileURLToPath } from 'url'; import path from 'path'; const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = path.dirname(__filename); if (!import.meta.dirname) { import.meta.dirname = __dirname; }"
